In the ethereal realm, celestial seraphs with iridescent wings danced gracefully amidst the celestial tapestry. Their voices echoed through the ethereal expanse, creating a symphony of harmonic reverberations that caressed the very fabric of the cosmos. As the celestial choir ascended towards the empyrean throne, their ethereal melodies soared through the heavens, leaving an ethereal resonance that lingered in the hearts of all who heard.
